sections.title: Master Spy (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Master Spy class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Table: Master Spy (Master Spy)
sections.description: Class progression table showing base attack bonus, saves, and special abilities gained at each level for the Master Spy prestige class.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Master Spy)
sections.description: Master spies gain no additional weapon or armor proficiencies beyond what they already possess.

sections.title: Art of Deception (Ex) (Master Spy)
sections.description: Adds master spy class level as a bonus to all Bluff, Disguise, and Sense Motive checks.

sections.title: Master of Disguise (Ex) (Master Spy)
sections.description: Allows creating disguises in half the normal time and reduces penalties for disguising as different gender, race, age, or size by 1.

sections.title: Sneak Attack (Ex) (Master Spy)
sections.description: Functions like rogue sneak attack, dealing +1d6 extra damage at 1st, 4th, 7th, and 10th levels, stacking with other sneak attack sources.

sections.title: Glib Lie (Su) (Master Spy)
sections.description: Allows the master spy to deceive truth-detecting magic by forcing a caster level check against DC 15 + class level.

sections.title: Mask Alignment (Su) (Master Spy)
sections.description: Allows altering alignment aura as a standard action to appear as any alignment or no alignment to detection spells.

sections.title: Nonmagical Aura (Sp) (Master Spy)
sections.description: Can use magic aura twice per day, but only to make objects appear nonmagical to detection spells.

sections.title: Superficial [Knowledge](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/skills/knowledge) (Ex) (Master Spy)
sections.description: Can make untrained Knowledge and Profession checks related to cover identity as if trained, with a bonus equal to half level.

sections.title: Concealed Thoughts (Su) (Master Spy)
sections.description: Allows controlling what surface thoughts are detected by detect thoughts and similar mind-reading magic.

sections.title: Quick Change (Ex) (Master Spy)
sections.description: Can assume a disguise in 2d4 rounds with a -10 penalty (-5 at 8th level) to the Disguise check.

sections.title: Elude Detection (Sp) (Master Spy)
sections.description: Functions as a nondetection spell with caster level equal to character level, suppressible as a standard action.

sections.title: Slippery Mind (Su) (Master Spy)
sections.description: Functions as the rogue advanced talent, allowing a second save against mental control effects, stacking with other sources.

sections.title: Shift Alignment (Su) (Master Spy)
sections.description: Improves mask alignment to actually function as the false alignment for all spells and magic items, including harmful effects.

sections.title: Death Attack (Ex) (Master Spy)
sections.description: Functions as the assassin's death attack ability, with levels stacking to determine save DC.

sections.title: Fool Casting (Su) (Master Spy)
sections.description: When succeeding on saves against control effects, can pretend to fail and appear controlled while remaining free.

sections.title: Hidden Mind (Sp) (Master Spy)
sections.description: Gains constant mind blank protection at character level, suppressible as a standard action.

sections.title: Assumption (Su) (Master Spy)
sections.description: As a full-round action, can touch a helpless creature to assume their identity for divination purposes, confusing location spells.
